plot: Repeat is the story of a 30 years old disenchanted, naive, Italian Peter Pan and the day before he decides to propose and marry his girlfriend Chiara.
title: Repeat 'I Stepped in Shit with My Flip Flop'
plot_es: Repeat is the story of a 30 years old disenchanted, naive, Italian Peter Pan and the day before he decides to propose and marry his girlfriend Chiara.
original_name: Repeat 'I Stepped in Shit with My Flip Flop'
plot_en: Repeat is the story of a 30 years old disenchanted, naive, Italian Peter Pan and the day before he decides to propose and marry his girlfriend Chiara.
